content: this pattern is free on my blog 1 there is a video tutorial available here 2 introducing the samantha s sleeves shrug this shrug is made with double_crochet stitches so it is a great beginner friendly garment pattern it is versatile and comes for sizes from xs-5x this shrug is great for keeping your arms warm without the bulkiness of a cardigan or sweater 1 https //carrowaycrochet com/samantha-sleeves-shrug-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //youtu be/daaswzkumbc
